name: King of the Mountain: Premium
description:
The Premium edition

Start your mountain journey with 100 crowns and an extra 10 cars unlocked from the start.

Title theme from Jason Shaw at audionautix

Stay on the track, complete clean laps, earn crowns and unlock cars.

Work your way up the mountain to drive a v8 supercar.

lower graphical settings for better framerates and physics stability.

Email me for further suggestions.
